website_summaries.verdict: For anyone owning a USB 3.0-ready laptop, the speedy and compact Toshiba Canvio Slim II makes an excellent companion for both storage expansion and data backup purposes.
pros: The Toshiba Canvio Slim II offers fast USB 3.0 speed, good bundled software and comes in a well-thought-out, sturdy design
cons: The Toshiba Canvio Slim II could be a bit slimmer, and its USB 2.0 performance is just average

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hard drive for the price. It is nice, slim, and reliable. The silver metal casing is absolutely beautiful. This external hard drive is truly mac/PC compatible and comes with the necessary software and instructions. There is backup software included with this hard drive but I have not tested it out or used it. Transferring items to and from this hard drive is very simple and the transfer rates are very quick. I have had it for 2 years now and have had no issues. I purchased a protective case as soon as purchased the hard drive:. I am still very please with my purchase and would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: FSL

customer_reviews.title: This hard drive went completely beserk
customer_reviews.text: This hard drive went completely beserk a few months after I bought it back in 2015. It had issues downloading things, sometimes wouldn't mount, and froze my computer. Plugged it in again recently to see if maybe I was too harsh before, but it was even worse this time. First it wouldn't open in finder, then it froze my finder, then it froze my whole computer. I had to manually shut down my computer (restart from the finder menu didn't even work). Keeping this thing far away from my computer from now on.
customer_reviews.author: ChinaDoll

customer_reviews.title: Portable, dual-system drive
customer_reviews.text: My main purpose for this drive was to use it on both my school's computers (Windows) and my laptop (Mac). Thanks to the built-in software, it has handled the transition between devices expertly and I've been able to use it well since purchasing it. The one drawback, believe it or not, is that it's too small (physical size). Finding a carrying case was difficult, and I have to pack the case with the cord in such a way that will minimize movement in transit. Otherwise, it would bounce all over the place. All in all, a strong external HDD option.
customer_reviews.author: Juanky

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 18 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hard drive in 2016 for my Mac. It's now September 2018 and I can no longer access what I stored on it. My Mac (or any other Mac for that matter) won't recognize the drive. I researched the problem online and it seems like it's a common problem for Mac users. After a while, the drive can no longer be reocgnized. According to online reviews/blogs, it's something Toshiba is aware of.
customer_reviews.author: Em Me

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Using it as a backup for a windows XP laptop, it is quite functional. Pros: attractive casing, lightweight, high capacity, at a fair price. Cons: In editing files directly on this drive, it seems to be a fraction slower than another external hard drive I have -- that other one is just 500 GB capacity FAT32 formatted with a tiny 3" USB 2 cord , while this one is 1TB NTFS formatted with a slightly longer USB cord, so perhaps those factors impact the speed. Still, the difference is so slight it is nearly negligible.
customer_reviews.author: Kani

customer_reviews.title: Good for the space, awful back up software
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 stars if the software that actually backs up the files worked. I have yet to get it to work correctly, and it's extrememly hard to navigate; not user friendly at all. That being said, this unit is very small so it's easily packed for traveling. I simply keep all of my files (I am a photographer) in one folder, and every other day I delete the folder from the external drive and copy and paste the most recent one from my computer. This is a hassle, and defeats the purpose of the software that's included, but it's enough for my needs and the portability and space on the drive is worth the money, IMO.
customer_reviews.author: kacebelle

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I had a couple issues formatting it to work with my Mac but Toshiba customer support was incredibly helpful and solved the problem right away (the directions another reviewer posted were very helpful as well) Overall, I far prefer this to the LaCie Rugged drives I've been using for years. It works much better with Time Machine and is just generally far more user friendly. For the size and price you really can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: MTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: NOT MADE FOR MACS - but doable
customer_reviews.text: Just got this so can't speak to its durability yet but wanted to post on its utility with Macs. IT WAS NOT EASY TO SET THIS UP ON MY MAC. This is definitely formatted for a PC so if you are a total technology-phobe this is not the hard drive for you. If you're up for it anyway, I found this link that helped me reformat the drive pretty easily:
customer_reviews.author: Annette Roche Ponnock

customer_reviews.title: ehh
customer_reviews.text: This hard drive seemed okay. However, the password app it came with really screwed me up. The problem is that it only works on whatever computer you have the app on. Kinda pointless for transferring files... I also found that it comes apart really easily...not a great design. I guess if you're smart and format it right when you get it, getting rid of all software, it could be okay. At least for transferring.
customer_reviews.author: Deb W

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hard drive (so far)
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hard drive (so far), I only use it for backups. The only negative is the Backup software that comes with it (NTI Backup Now EZ). After many back and forth with their technical support (by email every2/3 days, what's wrong with a phone#???), i can't run a full system backup without errors. I ran CHKDSK, I emptied my Quarantine list as instructed, still no luck. It's a piece of crap, don't bother with it. There are better free products out there.
customer_reviews.author: Gros Plan

customer_reviews.title: Great Drive for Mac users
customer_reviews.text: I had tried several external hard drives before this one and couldn't get them to work with my Mac, in spite of having some expert outside help installing and attempting to use them. This one couldn't be easier. You plug it into the computer and walk away. It takes several hours the first time to download everything, then it automatically updates everything from then on. Totally user friendly and carefree. Plus, the price was more than reasonable. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alte Oma in Illinois

customer_reviews.title: Using as a second drive
customer_reviews.text: THROWN by the USB 3. port-----my macpros are 2.0--- toshiba 24/7 tech support assured me it was backward compatible-- formatted it with disk utility & planning to use w iPhoto --- & all my "photographic art" images will let u know how it works----ps i am a non--tech trained mac user. And i am almost 70 i have the advantage of believing in support groups & how the intelligence of a group trumps a solo thinker. Hence i am a member of local macs club with very smart/supportive wonders. AND online Mac-Forums
customer_reviews.author: Kasha B.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a hard drive that I could use between my work PC and my home Macbook. I can plug this into both and pull off the files, but I cannot save and change files on it from both computers like I could with a pen drive. Whichever computer you use it on first is the only computer that you can edit the files on. Perhaps I am ignorant as to how external hard drives work, but it doesn't work the way I wanted it to. I would return it if I could, but it took me too long to figure this out!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Bocken

customer_reviews.title: First impressions are positive - plenty fast, plenty small, beautiful to look at
customer_reviews.text: I just received this about 2 hours ago and have since installed it on my Macbook Pro and assigned it as the Time Machine backup disk and completed my first 92 MB backup. Benchmark tests using the BlackMagic Disk Speed Test software shows it about 100 MB/s going through my USB 3.0 hub, which is way better than my older Buffalo USB 2.0 500GB drive was seeing, which was about 35 MB/s. Very pleased with the speed, the looks, the size. After a few weeks or months with it, I will revise this review up or down based on what happens as time rolls on.
customer_reviews.author: Larry S. Singleton

customer_reviews.title: Great with other backup software programs
customer_reviews.text: I have to concur with the others that had problems with the software that comes with this device. Basically, the software really sucks - it's VERY slow, and alot more complicated to operate than it should be. Luckily, the device is really good, and works very well with other backup software programs. I used a free software, called SyncBack Free ( That did the trick, no problems. So other than the software, I give this a thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: jazzygurl81

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for 3 years. After 1 year it stopped letting me add new files, thereby becoming a "read-only" drive. I could reformat it but I don't want to lose everything. Also, It dents very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Bolaget

customer_reviews.title: The software forces one to pick specific times for backup ...
customer_reviews.text: The software forces one to pick specific times for backup rather than allowing one to manually choose. It is also not clear that all the backups were done and one has no idea looking at the drive to discover where the backed up files may be. Simply copying one's files periodically to a high capacity flash drive would be simpler than using the external hard drive.
customer_reviews.author: chaslf

customer_reviews.title: sweet HD
customer_reviews.text: great little buy. seller shipped fast and the product works great. small unit could fit in the hand of 10 yr old or in your pocket like a phone. the metallic finish looks great and using the HD was easy. i used windows 8. no reformatting or software install required. only down side is the preinstalled software takes up 70GB of space so you only get 930 GB free space. but this is to be expected. any tech savvy person knows ALL tech products such as external hard drives phones computers game consoles etc will have less free space than advertised. is what it is.....
customer_reviews.author: ryan reyes

customer_reviews.title: Light and thin
customer_reviews.text: This Toshiba drive is light and thin (compared to my 4-year old Western Digital drives). It will snuggle in nicely with my netbook in a small carry case. Based on other reviews here, I did not install any of Toshiba's software on my drive and I deleted the Toshiba files with no problems. Then I used this drive to create a system image of recovery for my 2-year old Sony netbook. The backup of 29.25 GB took about 25 minutes with USB 2.0.
customer_reviews.author: trlamb

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move from device to device
customer_reviews.text: This would be an extra one purchased. 1st one was from sams club for $87and came with a 16gig flashdrive. For 1TB you get alot for your money. Easy to move from device to device. The 2nd one I purchased from amazon for $65 and it came with 10gig cloud storage. I use it for dvr back up of my kids tv shows to take on road trips. Added bonus is, it is a name brand.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: I’ve had it for 3 years now and it feels like it has infinite capacity
customer_reviews.text: I have a MacBook Air with 16GB memory (lol, I know) so I really need this Terabite. I’ve had it for 3 years now and it feels like it has infinite capacity. I love it and it matches the exact color of silver MacBooks. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katerin

customer_reviews.title: Back up fills up drive instead of overwriting.
customer_reviews.text: Went back to my Seagate. The backup software did not copy over but filled up this 1TB hard drive, my contents on C only 70 Gigs. I was stunned to find the drive almost 97 percent filled due to the back up software. Went back to my Seagate.
customer_reviews.author: TriedandTrue

customer_reviews.title: Super Slim
customer_reviews.text: It's amazingly small and slim. It works smoothly with my 2011 MacBook Pro. It's faster than expected too. I used to have a Samsung years ago. It was the most horrible purchase i have ever made. It broke when i tried to format it into regions to use on both mac and Win. This is worth every penny i spent. As noticed, it's plastic case looks and feel cold just like aluminum. I don't know why though but it's amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Works on iMac.  Just need to reformat the disk.
customer_reviews.text: Requires a wipe of the software to get it to work with a iMac. Other than being scary, it works. Details are on a variety of boards and the software is already on your Mac to do this. It's just getting the guts to hit 'ok' to wipe the drive clean and reformat. The HD has worked with no complaints for 6 weeks, from any of the 3 of us in the house who now have it as a back-up. I'll update the review if any of that changes.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lenagh

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this hard drive as both my Time Machine backup and for some general storage purposes. So far so good! I mean, everything's always dandy until your hard drive suddenly decides to crash out of nowhere, right? I bought this Toshiba hard drive because I have a different Toshiba-brand hard drive that I've been using for several years now, and that one's still working perfectly as well. That being said, this one feels very solid, very sleek, and I can tell it was money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Strnad

customer_reviews.title: I was easily able to restore all my data with no problem ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been a lifesaver for my data with my mid-2010 MacBook Pro!!! I've had to take my computer in multiple times for service during the last several months, and every time I've been informed that I may lose the data on my hard drive when it goes out for repair, I'm not even concerned because I have everything backed up on this device! The two times when they did actually have to replace the hard drive, I was easily able to restore all my data with no problem both times using this external hard drive. This is also very easy to use to recover old files. I use Time Machine for backups.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.text: I am not a tech person but use this for heavy duty academic work back-ups. I love this drive. Super lightweight, and portable. Slips into my backpack. I remember I had some initial issue getting it to work with an older Macbook Pro but seems to do the job fine. Brushed aluminum exterior is classy and seems resistant to taking tumbles off the couch. I am very happy with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: JA Says

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Sadly the drive does not work. Would not come up as a recognizable drive on any of my computers. Would power on, run, then turn off. Very disappointed, after looking online it appears this drive has numerous complaints about very same issue of not coming up on computer and doing noting. Would not buy again returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Good Item fast shipping with prime
customer_reviews.text: The item was received on time. It looks sleek and compact as expected. The only thing that worries me is that when I connect it or when it starts it makes a weird noise that reminds me of an overload circuit...but it has been working fine -so far- and the starting noise might be a normal occurrence.
customer_reviews.author: Gipsyazul

customer_reviews.title: Handy Toshiba Canvio
customer_reviews.text: I bought this small drive to collect as much data off my crashed desktop so I could then transfer it to my new MacBook Pro. I am not disappointed. The software that came with the drive makes it easy to operate and and I have stored all my pictures and documents on it that are vital. It is lightweight and travels with me and my MacBook!
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Darling

customer_reviews.title: frustrating for mac users
customer_reviews.text: the unit is small and seems sturdily built. mac users are probably better off getting the mac version as the software included for using this unit with a mac didn't work for me. i finally went on the internet to find a site [...] which explained in detail how to reformat the software in disk utility. even then i had to mess around with the time machine preferences. all in all a nice machine, but frustrating for mac users.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I had read in past reviews that the case was made of a plastic feeling material rather than metal, and so I wasn't surprised when that was what I received. I'm happy with this External Hard Drive as it has excellent speeds and a lot of memory for the price. I also really like the light that changes color based on USB speed. I didn't try the software and won't be using it.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Compact size, quick speed make me happy
customer_reviews.text: Writes/retrieves quickly. Super small - it's slightly larger than a deck of cards, but about half as thick. I tried to use it with a USB hub, but it didn't work with the one I have. I think I need one that has it's own power source. This made it harder to use than I wanted because my laptop only had a few USB ports.
customer_reviews.author: l_orie

customer_reviews.title: Mega USB Time
customer_reviews.text: I don't really use the programs already installed on this harddrive, but I use it like a mega USB. The transfer process is a tad on the slow side, but it does its job at backing up your data when you need it too. The outside is nice and sleek, which I also loved about it. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Boone

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I've used this hard drive for appr. 3-4 months. It gets the job done. As a photographer, the images and file sizes fill up my computer's storage rather quickly, so it's nice to have this as a back up so I can clear up space as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: It worked for me until it stopped registering on my computer and there’s no way I can access it, i tried everything and now it’s just taking space on m desk.
customer_reviews.author: Armando

customer_reviews.title: This was a life saver when my HP went kaput ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a life saver when my HP went kaput and I got a apple, plugged in the external hard drive and nothing was lost.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby E. Strock

customer_reviews.title: just in case anything got deleted since I have an older Mac (as recommended by Apple Genius dude)
customer_reviews.text: I don't know much about technology, but I ordered this for my Macbook Pro so I could back everything up that I wanted to save before downloading the newest version of iOS, just in case anything got deleted since I have an older Mac (as recommended by Apple Genius dude). I'm pretty sure I got everything downloaded onto this external hard drive, and it didn't even take very long. What took FOREVER was downloading the latest software update to my MacBook pro (almost two full days). But now my MacBook is much quicker and doesn't "fall asleep" without waking up anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After a major computer scare where I thought I lost ...
customer_reviews.text: After a major computer scare where I thought I lost everything (thankfully I didn't) I bought this external hard drive. So far its working as expected and allows me to sleep a bit easier.
customer_reviews.author: Bearsblow

customer_reviews.title: Nice USB 3.0 Hard drive
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my ultra book. As an old techie, I am amused how small and inexpensive this stuff is...my first hard drive was 20Mb and cost $300! This is about the size of a deck of cards and half as thick so it's hard not to be in awe of this totally normal piece of hardware. The USB 3.0 seems to speed things up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Raven

customer_reviews.title: Flash Drive here I come
customer_reviews.text: Every time I do a back-up, it always says, "backed up with errors". I have talked to product support and they were no help. I keep getting messages saying that an update is available, but when you go to the site, you find out that the update costs $10. Flash drive(s) would probably work as well and would be cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Charline Franks

customer_reviews.title: Great drive, but skip the bloatware.
customer_reviews.text: The unit is extremely small. I have yet to figure out all the back-up programs that come with the device as the instructions are not clear and you cannot edit the settings (file location, etc.).
customer_reviews.author: land_shark3

customer_reviews.title: Recommend purchase through the wRehouse to save
customer_reviews.text: This is the second item I have purchased from Amazon Warehouse Deals. Items are significant cheaper and are basically new, only returned by the original buyer. The item was repackaged carefully and itemized to make sure all instructions and parts were there. Recommend purchase through the wRehouse to save money
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: I am please with this product aside from one minor ...
customer_reviews.text: I am please with this product aside from one minor detail. The amount of GB was not the same amount stated, it was supposed to have a space of 500GB but when I received it, it only had a space of 465GB. Not to much a skimp but still, that's 35GB that I don't have, especially considering the decent amount of money I paid for this product. Other then that, the item is working just as how it was stated it should. Thank you very much for it! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Reasha

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Toshiba Canvio External hard drive we have purchased from Amazon. They work perfectly out of the box. We kept two for our use and the third was a gift for someone who could not decide on a birthday present. She was pleasantly surprised and pleased with the gift..
customer_reviews.author: Bob Jetski

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I already had one of these. I bought this as a graduation gift. I have had a 500 MB Toshiba drive for years that I carry around with me, and never had any problems, so I steer everyone to these, as opposed to the big, clunky competitors. Their technology of protecting the drive when sudden movements occur (dropping them on the floor!), really works.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo

customer_reviews.title: This drive worked perfectly. I m not a conventional ...
customer_reviews.text: This drive worked perfectly. I m not a conventional user. I blew away the Win formatting and built an external Linux FC21 OS on this drive. It has performed perfectly well on a USB3 port and gives reasonable speed. I have had it running 24/7 for several weeks without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Cydyreal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Drive.
customer_reviews.text: You just plug it in and it WORKS! It gets its power via the USB connection, so no separate power cord into the wall. No drivers to install. It works just like a memory stick. There's a little white LED in the corner to let you know it's operating. It's quiet and compact. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: countach2

customer_reviews.title: Easy plug and play and works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to backup my pictures and music on my PC. Easy plug and play and works great. I haven't filled it up...yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jody P

customer_reviews.title: Three year warranty as well is nice to have
customer_reviews.text: Needed a cost effective hard drive that was USB powered to have music in my vehicle. This works perfectly. Powers off after five minutes of non use, so it won't drain truck battery. Three year warranty as well is nice to have. Nice and small, and made out of metal.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M.

customer_reviews.title: Great price Great product
customer_reviews.text: This item was a Christmas gift for my fiance and hasn't had any issues in the past 3 months of her owning it. She uses it on both Mac and PC computers with no issues, the product works well, loads quickly, has not had any errors with files, I am completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a MacBook and was in the need for an external hard drive that I could use at work on a PC and at home on the Mac. This device works GREAT! Very quick set up and installation with more than enough memory. Small and well built. Elated with how it has been working so far.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewing4You

customer_reviews.title: Tiny Size, Massive Storage Capability
customer_reviews.text: This external hard drive has worked great for me. So much storage capability in such a small space. Love it! Works great with my MacBook Air.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Freezes my computer
customer_reviews.text: I have a computer that is a little bit older. It's a Windows 7 so I bought this to back up my hard drive. It's easy to download and it's easy to use. However, every time I try and do a full system backup it completes %53 and then freezes. Every single time. It says it's compatible with Windows 7 so this shouldn't be happening.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: yes i got this item and yes it works great
customer_reviews.text: great item it will take you a few mins to learn to use it but it dose work ok found out this if you use this item and have to set your labtop back to factory it dosent work any more
customer_reviews.author: danny rudolph

customer_reviews.title: Great External Hard Drive
customer_reviews.text: Not compatible with my PS3, I wanted to be able to play my digital media that was stored on my PS3; music, movies, pictures. But, it still works great as a storage device! I was able to make my laptop run like new.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Garcia

customer_reviews.title: This product is awesome. Very light
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. Very light, so you could carry on your pocket and use it anytime when you need. Works fine, no noise. It has USB 2.0 and 3.0. which transfers data with high speed, sure if your comp supports that.
customer_reviews.author: Abror B. Zaynutdinov

customer_reviews.title: A portable and quick external hard drive that took less ...
customer_reviews.text: A portable and quick external hard drive that took less than about 45 minutes to transfer 300GB of files. No complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Warrior

customer_reviews.title: This External Hardrive Is Great!
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised about the size and weight of It I thought it would be bigger but it's a perfect size, love how it works for Mac and PC makes things easier for me and the smooth feeling on the surface
customer_reviews.author: S.G.

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with the Toshiba drive
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the Toshiba drive. I removed the backup software that came with it and I use Aomei backup software. Its free and works great! I would highly recommend this drive....
customer_reviews.author: Judi, a faithful Holmes fan

customer_reviews.title: Works with my Surface 2
customer_reviews.text: I like this USB drive, just wish they made them in larger sizes. It is the slimmest non SSD drive I have seen and works great with my Surface Pro 2 (which is very picky about external USB drives).
customer_reviews.author: MidnightRunner

customer_reviews.title: Compact and very well built
customer_reviews.text: The hard drive is much smaller than I thought, although a little thicker. But the drive works great. I'm taking this on my trip to store all of my pictures from my DSLR. It's well made and is a great product. I would definitely recommend for photographers to take on your trip.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Y.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect transportable HD
customer_reviews.text: It's small, about the size of a casette tape sleek, and very easy to use. Plug it in and start stacking your data. Simple as that. Great price on amazon as well. If I used a macbook this would be a must because it's as sleek as the Macs.
customer_reviews.author: American Lion

customer_reviews.title: Requires no external power supply.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in two days and works perfectly. This is the smallest (thinnest)1 terabyte drive I have ever seen and requires no external power supply.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Mann

customer_reviews.title: 10 stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I use it everyday. I have filled it up and already bought another one. I use it mostly for movies but i have music on it as well. I use it from my computer and if i want to watch a movie i just move it to my smart tv and plug it into the usb port on the tv and itll pop up there. I couldnt ask for a better product. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: victor rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I backed up my entire laptop on this and it didn't even take up 10% of the available memory. I did a lot of research about what hard drive was the best value given reputation, size, pricing, etc. This one had the best reviews on the tech websites and amazon. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I decided I have to many items I want to keep on a separate drive, that will not fill my laptop, so I purchased this Toshiba slim 2. works perfectly and my only regret was that I did not get the 2 tb version!
customer_reviews.author: Roderick A. Bell

customer_reviews.title: So simple
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use back up drive for a laptop docking station.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Poleaux

customer_reviews.title: Re-saved all of my music and image files.
customer_reviews.text: I re-saved all of my mp3's and image files from an older Toshiba Canvio Slim. Now I have double backup.
customer_reviews.author: John Geary

customer_reviews.title: Good, and easy to scratch
customer_reviews.text: Nice build quality, but it not hard to scratch, so it should have rubber bumps on the bottom so it wouldn't be touching the table, and thus scratching it. But metal housing is good protection against drops File transfer speeds are good through USB 3.0
customer_reviews.author: eduardovitalino

customer_reviews.title: Was easy to hook up and I have not heard anything ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's Mac since the internal SSD had too little capacity for all her pics. Was easy to hook up and I have not heard anything since which usually means it's all good.
customer_reviews.author: LeoP

customer_reviews.title: Hardware busted
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to use with my Macbook Pro. Couldn't get the software to work after much tinkering (and pretty bad instructions). Thought it was an issue with modifying it for use with IOS, so I waited until I had access to a Windows OS to test it. Turns out it is a hardware issue and the hard drive is useless.
customer_reviews.author: were3esef

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Recommended if you are looking for small portable external hard drive. Enclosure is metal and will scratch with abuse. Drive is quiet and speed is above expected for price range. My experience has been positive.
customer_reviews.author: J.H.

customer_reviews.title: the cables are very bad about shorting out and not working
customer_reviews.text: Cheap made, the cables are very bad about shorting out and not working. Not as fast as I would have hoped either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted it to store movies and music. which it does. got a few games there. i usually use it on USB 2.0 so the light is white on the corner. i plugged it in once on a USB 3.0 and the light turn blue(i think) so i thought that was cool.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Carlos Mercado Lopez

customer_reviews.title: External great for Back Ups
customer_reviews.text: I have used this Portable External Drive and am impressed with how well it stores my digital files. This product was perfect for backing up all of my picture and music.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney D.

customer_reviews.title: The Toshiba slim EHDs ...
customer_reviews.text: I have five of this model of EHD - one each of my separate computers. Their 500gb capacity in the slim line style are efficient and also take little storage space when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Rocklingranny

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift and the person loved it. I guess it's great that can be used with PC and Mac. Best price for the features.
customer_reviews.author: I Like Dirt

customer_reviews.title: This Hard drive is fantastic for any back up needed
customer_reviews.text: This Hard drive is fantastic for any back up needed, a very slim design, for an external hard drive it looks very smart
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: But Toshiba support can get better.
customer_reviews.text: This device failed in a year. The warranty is handled through the Toshiba Website, but there is no way to contact them without the serial number or part number, both of which were not recognized by the system when I entered the exact information onto the website. Stuff fails; no problem. But Toshiba support can get better.
customer_reviews.author: Travis M. Fucich

customer_reviews.title: A work of Art
customer_reviews.text: Super slim beauty is perfect for anyone on the go- so compact yet so volumeous.... Perfect in every way I condensed 4 bulky hard drives into this petite package of perfection. thank you Toshiba.
customer_reviews.author: bbke**

customer_reviews.title: Great little, portable external hard drive
customer_reviews.text: I needed to back up some documents and music for when I travel. This little portable Toshiba Canvio Slim is perfect; it's small and light so that it fits into my handbag without taking up much space. It is easy to use, especially if you are not a techie. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bayridge girl

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Great Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great Product and now no more small it USB drives getting lost everywhere. Great Delivery and Price
customer_reviews.author: Deborah W Sigafus

customer_reviews.title: It's okay.
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. Nothing special. Cool software came with it. Small enough to fit in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Work well for my Music Library
customer_reviews.text: Work well for music storage...continued use for over 18 months without issue. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: EAW

customer_reviews.title: Slim and Portable
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, no problems transferring files. Has a slim profile so it's easy to store or carry in your bag. Awesome price too! (I got it for $44.99)
customer_reviews.author: Inches

customer_reviews.title: I have always loved the look of brushed metal
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved the look of brushed metal. My desktop and my laptop are both brushed metal so I am excited that my hard drive is also brushed metal. It is real metal and is fairly lightweight and small for a portable hard drive. The speed of the file transfer is amazing and works really well. Overall, I couldn't ask for a better portable hard drive.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Rogers

customer_reviews.title: ... to use with my Mac and it was a super easy! Just plugged in and transferred
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to use with my Mac and it was a super easy! Just plugged in and transferred. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: PIX809

customer_reviews.title: Useful and conveniently small.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and small. Brushed finish. Easy to connect and load. Useful and conveniently small. My first external drive. Will be a huge help for my old computer.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Austen

customer_reviews.title: great size, had no problems with it yet
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly formatted for my Macbook Pro, great size, had no problems with it yet. The cord is ridiculously long, though.
customer_reviews.author: Art and Writing

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice So far happy
customer_reviews.text: So far so good I didnt get it for back up but not a bad idea,I use it to take Files to my Computer that will hopefully never be online
customer_reviews.author: rsdno

customer_reviews.title: It's 2015 and apparently Toshiba is still using lead based ...
customer_reviews.text: It's 2015 and apparently Toshiba is still using lead based paint or metals to make the silver external hard drive. When you open the packaging a slip of paper falls out and warns you to "wash your hands after immediately after handling the device because the case contains lead a known carcinogen."
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I build computers and custom work and this is a good buy for backups or holding songs movies ect . Very very light weight and works great so far. 62 dollars for 1TB thats portable .
customer_reviews.author: computer gezz

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: Most ok, response not as good as expected. Seems to take a while to wake up after idling down. As long as it keeps working I'll be satisfied
customer_reviews.author: S. Wayne Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but the Micro USB end of the supplied ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but the Micro USB end of the supplied cable is a little flimsy, and I had to replace it after it stopped connecting properly. Still a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Fast and easy to use. Style is modern and sits well with my apple computer. Used it to back up all my info and store additional information with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Rey

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this to a friend
customer_reviews.text: I am using it for an image backup. The USB 3.0 makes it a fast down load and restore. Yes, I would recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Watch for sales or buy something else
customer_reviews.text: Good product, a little pricey. Other brands may find better value. I recommend this at $59-69 or look elsewhere if this costs more.
customer_reviews.author: WillGetITDone

customer_reviews.title: My extra backup disk
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 the silver and the black of this model. No complaint for the moment. Good performance.
customer_reviews.author: IronMan

customer_reviews.title: DOA, useless, requested a return.
customer_reviews.text: When I got this hard drive, it wouldn't erase, format, or partition. Its icon would only show up on the desktop of the computer sometimes. I could get data to transfer to it, but at about 5% of the rate that I would normally expect, and I was plugging it into USB 3 ports. My computer also was unable to eject it properly. It behaved the same way on my Windows 7 based computer. I'm sure that others have had much better experiences with this product, and please weigh the other reviews against mine, but my personal experience with this drive was very poor. I'm in the process of returning it for full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Super_K

product_meta.title: Toshiba Canvio Slim II 500GB Portable External Hard Drive, Black (HDTD205XK3D1)
product_meta.description: Capacity:500 GB| Color:BlackToshiba Canvio Slim II Portable External Hard Drive is ideal for taking your storage on the go. This drive offers high capacity storage in a slim and sleek brushed aluminum design that is a perfect companion for your notebook. Stay connected with your friends and family with the Pogo plug PC5. Leave your Canvio Slim II at home, connected to your PC and still have complete access to all your files, photos, music and movies on any computer, smartphone or tablet - anywhere, anytime5. You can even share massive files and folders instantly from your PC and Canvio Slim II with Pogo plug. As an extra bonus, Canvio Slim II includes 10GB of free cloud storage5 for storing "always-available" copies of important files. Go Mobile The Canvio Slim II is sleek and ultra portable - yet able to store even the largest digital libraries with up to 1TB storage capacity. Forget your files? No problem - the Canvio Slim II comes with file and folder remote access feature so you can access your files anywhere anytime via the internet5. You can even back up content from your mobile devices to the Canvio Slim II or to the cloud. Secure The Canvio Slim II Portable Drives include a password lock feature that prevents unauthorized access to your drive. Get peace of mind knowing your data is kept safe on the go.
feature_bullets: The Canvio Slim II lets you store your files in a centralized place next to your computer, giving you easy access to your files whenever you need them.

Safeguard your valuable data Preloaded easy-to-use backup software, o Schedule automatic backup File, folder and full system backup and recovery Password-Protected encryption for your backed up files (up to 256-bit)

PC and Mac Compatible Toshiba Canvio Slim II Portable Drives are preformatted NTFS for Windows 8, 7, and Windows XP. Plus, the drive comes with a NTFS driver for Mac allowing you to store and access files from the PC and Mac without reformatting.
Access and share content from any device anywhere via the internet Upload and download content from any device easily. Share massive files and folders instantly from your PC and Canvio Slim II

Mobile & Secure Access content remotely from mobile devices. Back up content from your mobile devices PC & Mac compatible. Stores and access files from PC and Mac without reformatting Password lock feature to prevent unauthorized drive access
Storage companion for your Ultra books (TM) Slim and lightweight design. Sleek brushed aluminum finish
Peace of Mind - 3 - year limited warranty included
